__*New Released Brands*__

*Focus Point, GDeal, Kaodim, Carsome, Canva.*

Presenting a list of handpicked brands that we have curated specially for you! Ranging from service providers to marketplaces where you can get anything you want, we have covered it all.

Shop online and you will be rewarded. That means when you shop with our brand partners through Raiz Rewards, you will receive a cash reward which will be invested back into your Raiz Investment Account.

So, as you shop, you invest! Be on your way to receive a cash reward just by clicking the “__Shop Online Here__” button-through Raiz Rewards\*.

__\*Terms & Conditions apply.__

__Check out our new brand partners below!__

__Focus Point__  
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/41.png)

__(+ up to 3.92% invested)__

__Focus Point__ is the largest optical retail chain store in Malaysia with over 190 outlets nationwide.

Shop online now with __Focus Point__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 3.92%__of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

Shop online now with __GDeal__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __4.20%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Kaodim__

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/43.png)__

__(RM1.75 invested)__

Book here with __Kaodim__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __RM1.75__ into your Raiz account.

__Carsome__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/42.png)  
__(RM7.35 invested)__

__Carsome__ is Southeast Asia’s largest integrated car e-commerce platform which aims to digitize the region’s used car industry by reshaping and elevating the car buying and selling experience.

Book here with __Carsome__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __RM7.35__ into your Raiz account.

__Canva__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/44.png)  
__(+ 39.20% invested)__

__Canva__ is an online design and publishing tool with a mission to empower everyone in the world to design anything and publish anywhere.

Subscribe here with __Canva__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __39.20%__of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.
